parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandated for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for President.  While the image shows two USR candidates, the text focuses on Elena Lasconi, clearly identifying a specific parliamentary candidate. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message targets a wide audience, not just personal contacts. Facebook's public nature ensures broad reach, satisfying "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective is to encourage voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party. The call to action ("Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!") directly aims to influence voting behavior. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a clear endorsement, not an informative piece.  It doesn't present different viewpoints or provide balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>This is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, exceeding the bounds of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>4123748011229965</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), targets a wide audience via a paid Facebook campaign, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose her. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  The argument that it promotes other USR candidates is weak, as the text focuses overwhelmingly on Elena Lasconi.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Elena Lasconi</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID 4123748011229965), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Elena Lasconi la președinție, îndemnând la vot cu fraza "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!",  având un efect electoral clar pozitiv asupra acesteia. Postarea, care a avut o estimare a vizualizărilor între 3000 și 4000,  și o estimare a audienței de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane,  conține un număr CMF (11240015), indicând material de campanie electorală.  Cheltuielile pentru această postare au fost între 100 și 199 RON.  Aceste acțiuni constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, încălcând prevederile legale.  Informațiile de contact ale USR Maramureș sunt comunicare@usr.ro și +40743564061.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
